name: Bad Antics
description:
Bad Antics is a resource gathering / tower defense game. The objective is to keep your ant hive alive for as long as possible while thwarting wave after wave of the evil red ant army.

Some tips:

  • Turrets consume stone when firing
  • Mobs don't collide with turrets, they march right through! Told you, they're evil.

Couple of things missing from this build, as they didn't make the cut:

  • Game over. Your health just goes negative. Be kind and close the window you cheater.
  • Restarting.
